title: WTT:  Cobb Green, Red and Bat Off, Mattys, Speaker and more for trade
author: bounce

posts.post_title: WTT:  Cobb Green, Red and Bat Off, Mattys, Speaker and more for trade
posts.post_content:
Looking to add some new cards to my collection, in order to make room I'd like to try trading some of these (see 2nd post).  I can also send back scans upon request.

Really just looking to trade at the moment, let me know what you got?

Things I'd definitely be interested in trading for (bold are priorities):
- 1914 Cracker Jack Ty Cobb
- 1914 Cracker Jack Nap Lajoie
- E90-2 Honus Wagner
- E92 Dockman Honus Wagner (either pose)
- T205 Walter Johnson (any back, especially Polar Bear)
- T205 Ty Cobb (any back)
- T205 Cy Young (any back)
- T206 Walter Johnson Portrait - Hindu, 649 Overprint, Sovereign 150, Old Mill, EPDG
- T206 Walter Johnson Pitching - American Beauty, EPDG, Polar Bear, Sovereign 350, Tolstoi
- T206 Ty Cobb Red portrait - any "uncommon back", especially EPDG or Sovereign 350
- T206 Ty Cobb bat on - Sovereign 350
- T206 Christy Mathewson Portrait - just about any, especially Sovereign 350
- T206 Christy Mathewson White Cap - 649 Overprint, Sovereign 150
- T206 Christy Mathewson Dark Cap - any "uncommon" back, especially American Beauty, EPDG or Old Mill
- T206 Tris Speaker - American Beauty, Cycle or Tolstoi
- T206 Cy Young Portrait - Sweet Cap 150, EPDG or Old Mill
- T206 Hall of Famer Portraits
- T206 Hall of Famer Polar Bear backs

Would like graded PSA or SGC cards, something in the 3-5 range usually.

PM or email to [url]david@davidratliff.com[/url]

Thanks
